Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceArn.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance (ARN).
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance (ARN).

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the contact flow module.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the contact flow module.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 127  
Pattern: .*\S.*  
Update requires: No interruption

Content.description: The content of the contact flow module in JSON format.
Content.markdownDescription:
The content of the contact flow module in JSON format.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256000  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: The description of the contact flow module.
Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the contact flow module.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 500  
Pattern: .*\S.*  
Update requires: No interruption

State.description: The state of the contact flow module.
State.markdownDescription:
The state of the contact flow module.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | ARCHIVED  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
One or more tags.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ContactFlowModuleArn.description: The identifier of the contact flow module (ARN).
ContactFlowModuleArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the contact flow module (ARN).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/flow-module/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The status of the contact flow module.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the contact flow module.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PUBLISHED | SAVED  
Update requires: No interruption
